		Question: what is the islamic belief

answer:
Sure, here is the answer:

The Islamic belief is Submission to the will of God. Muslims believe that every moment of life is governed by the Will of God. Submission to God and obedience to the Prophet Muhammad are the pillars of the Islamic faith. Muslims believe in the oneness of God, the messengers of God, divine revelation, angels, and heavenly realms. Muslims maintain a veneration for the Qur'an as the ultimate source of divine guidance. Muslims also uphold the sanctity of the Prophet Muhammad,
